resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107274</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107274</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204530</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A comparison of the plant ecology of two fields</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Vergleich der Betriebsökologie von zwei 
fängt auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une comparaison de la phytoécologie de deux 
zones</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma comparação do ecology de planta de dois 
campos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un confronto dell'ecologia delle piante di due 
campi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σύγκριση της οικολογίας εγκαταστάσεων δύο πεδίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una comparación de la ecología de planta de dos 
campos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will apply random sampling techniques to do a plant population/community/ecosystem study to model how these things are interrelated.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer wenden 
Stichprobenverfahrentechniken an, um eine 
Betriebspopulation/community/ecosystem Studie zu tun, um zu formen, 
wie diese Sachen zusammengehangen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants appliqueront des techniques 
d'échantillonage aléatoire pour faire une étude de l'usine 
population/community/ecosystem pour modeler comment ces choses sont 
interliées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes aplicarão técnicas de amostragem 
aleatória para fazer um estudo da planta 
population/community/ecosystem para modelar como estas coisas são 
relacionadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi applicheranno le tecniche di 
campionatura casuali per fare uno studio della pianta 
population/community/ecosystem per modellare come queste cose sono 
correlate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εφαρμόσουν τις τεχνικές τυχαίας 
δειγματοληψίας για να κάνουν μια μελέτη εγκαταστάσεων 
population/community/ecosystem για να διαμορφώσουν πώς αυτά τα 
πράγματα είναι αλληλένδετα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes aplicarán técnicas de muestreo 
al azar para hacer un estudio de la planta 
population/community/ecosystem para modelar cómo se correlacionan 
estas cosas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:LINDA SUTTON
FN:LINDA SUTTON
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204530</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107274</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/a-comparison-of-the-plant-ecology-of-two-fields</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
